coffee.name: [FS] Iced Classic Latte
coffee.description: Racikan espresso khas Fore Coffee dan krim susu pilihan. 100% cita rasa kopi Indonesia.

coffee.name: Nutty Oat Latte
coffee.description: Espresso dari biji kopi khas nusantara dipadukan susu oat gluten-free dan sensasi nutty dari hazelnut.

coffee.name: Iced Classic Latte
coffee.description: Perpaduan rasa espresso premium dengan saus krim spesial Fore.

coffee.name: Hot Cappuccino
coffee.description: Espresso shots dengan susu hangat dan lapisan foam tebal di atasnya.

coffee.name: Double Iced Shaken Latte
coffee.description: Paduan klasik 2 shot espresso dengan susu dan krim.

coffee.name: Hot Café Latte
coffee.description: Paduan espresso dengan susu sapi pilihan dan sedikit foam di atasnya.

food.description: Sandwich dengan mayonaise, butiran blackpepper, cheddar cheese, dan tuna fillet.

food.name: Chicken Curry Sandwich

food.name: Asian Beef Black Pepper Sandwich

food.name: Almond Croissant

testimony.name: Sumanda Tondang
testimony.title: Director of Fund Development & Communication at SOS Children’s Villages
testimony.description: Kami sangat mengapresiasi inisiatif dari Fore Coffee untuk berkolaborasi bersama dalam kampanye ini. Semoga kolaborasi kami dengan Fore Coffee bisa menginspirasi banyak pihak terutama dalam melakukan kampanye kebaikan.

testimony.name: Albert Kurniawan
testimony.title: Head of Growth and Acquisition BCA Digital
testimony.description: Integrasi Ekosistem Digital Fore x blu memudahkan Genz & Millenials membeli kopi lewat pembayaran digital untuk menemani kegiatan sehari-hari sambil menikmati berbagai promo yang tersedia! Terbukti, transaksi selalu tinggi karena Fore selalu di hati! ❤️

testimony.name: Audry Andika
testimony.title: Enterprise Business Development of ShopeeFood
testimony.description: Fore Coffee is one of the best choices if it is about coffee brands. The best part that makes Fore Coffee a well-known brand are Aren Latte and the most famous Pandan Latte. I am humbled to work with Fore Team, They are not just an ordinary team, but they are really cooperative and fun to have discuss

testimony.name: Nina Sudianto
testimony.title: Enterprise Merchant Partnerships at GoFood
testimony.description: Fore Coffee is one of the most important GoFood merchants. As a partner, Fore is a very collaborative merchant because, during the pandemic when all businesses were sluggish, we were able to collaborate to rebuild from scratch in order to turn around the business and achieve tremendous growth.
